title: Integrated Mathematics Learning Design Through Smartphone-Based Science Application Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and programming
context.additional_context: Learners, as professionals in technical fields, strengthen meta-representational skills by applying mathematical modeling to the development of smart device applications

learning_goals: Learners can design science applications by applying smartphone sensor data to mathematical models.
Learners can propose problem-solving solutions based on meta-representational skills that translate expressions across different academic disciplines.
Learners can build programming procedures to solve real-world problems by applying computational thinking (CT).

resources: LMS (Learning Management System) Construction and Operation System

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
